statements: DELETE FROM TimeSeriesData WHERE value = 100 AND trend_analysis = 'Up';
DELETE FROM moving_averages WHERE value > 100 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM trend_analysis WHERE trend_result < -1.5 OR timestamp >= '2022-06-01' AND timestamp < '2022-07-01';
DELETE FROM moving_average WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND value > 50;
DELETE FROM trend_analysis WHERE trend = 'upward' OR trend = 'downward';
DELETE FROM trend_analysis WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-03-31';
DELETE FROM moving_avg WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-02-01 00:00:00'
